description.value: False-Man: You are a gene-crafted creation, built for purposes unknownâ€”perhaps a failed experiment or a heretical masterwork. Your body is optimized beyond normal human limits, but your mind bears scars from the process.

system.benefit: Gain Ambidextrous, Autosanguine, and Chem-Geld talents. Increase two characteristics by +3 and reduce one by -3. Gain 2d10 Insanity Points or lose 1 Fate Point.
system.notes: Costs 300 XP. Choose 2 characteristics for +3, 1 for -3. Choose 2d10 Insanity OR lose 1 Fate.

specialAbilities.name: Gene-Crafted Body
specialAbilities.description: Choose two characteristics to increase by +3 and one characteristic to reduce by -3.

specialAbilities.name: Consequence of Creation
specialAbilities.description: Choose one: Gain 2d10 Insanity Points OR lose 1 Fate Point.
